programmes.show_description: Epic fantasy adventure with Brigitte Nielsen. Armed with a magic sword, a fearless warrior sets out to avenge her family's deaths and stop a murderous queen from using a powerful talisman.
Hammer horror. When a plague spreads through a Cornish village, it is discovered that the victims' graves are empty and a deranged Squire dabbling in black magic has an army of zombies.

The Judge learns about a new dog breed when an 8-year-old boy is allegedly attacked by a neighbour's pet.
A man has buyer's remorse after spending over $8,000 on furniture; the salesperson points to a 'no-refund' policy clearly printed on the receipt.
A woman is accused of stealing from the estate of an 80-year-old woman and then selling her furniture; she sues for slander and defamation.
An elderly landlord calls the police because she fears a tenant has been a victim of terrible violence; alleged alcoholism and a police witness come into play.
A man sues his adopted son's sister for parking tickets, impound fees and an unpaid loan for a car that's in his name.
A man accuses his teenage cousin of having a serious drug problem and of vandalizing his property; the teen's mother claims their cousin embarrassed them online.
Burglary, two counts of attempted sex abuse and a mother giving her child up for adoption come into play when unwed parents fight over property.
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases.
A newlywed sues a bridal-shop owner for delivering an allegedly damaged, custom-made wedding gown.

Cayley Mandadi was a 19-year-old sophomore at Trinity University when she arrived at a hospital in Texas in 2017. She was nearly naked, bruised and wasn't breathing.
In separate incidents, Britney Gulley and her friend Jeremisha Adams murder two men in cold blood and blind another with a shotgun blast to the face.
The body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. She's been stabbed 39 times. Her boyfriend Cliff Youens turned cutting remarks into a knife-wielding rage.
In April 1995, Louise Ellis leaves her Ottawa home to spend the weekend with her ex-boyfriend and his daughter in the Gatineau Hills. She is never seen again.
When 72-year-old Toronto resident Harley Walker went missing, his worried friend Greg Seale walked to Harley's house and found a stranger opening the door.

A man's intense yearning for his youth turns him into a boy again.
Action thriller with Owen Wilson. An American family moves to Asia, but faces a fight for survival when a revolution sweeps the country and the new government seeks to eliminate foreigners
Thriller with Clive Owen. An Interpol agent and a district attorney risk their lives to bring to light the vast range of illegal activities being carried out by a major international bank.
Action thriller sequel with Sylvester Stallone. Security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from an impenetrable Latvian prison.
Tense thriller with Kim Basinger. A timid, downtrodden housewife is chased into the desolate woods by a street gang, where she uses the contents of her toolbox to fight for her life.

A young man is accused of violence against his girlfriend; the court finds him guilty of disturbing the peace.
A woman sues the father of her youngest son for the return of property; he claims she filed a restraining order and called DCS repeatedly.
A partygoer testifies that a friend's parked car was slammed and thrown across the street by a passing vehicle.
When asked about an assault with an ex-girlfriend, a man changes his story once evidence of alleged bruising is brought to light.
A contractor with over 40 years in the industry, accuses a disgruntled customer of slamming him on social media; she says he didn't do his job.
A man denies he was romantically interested in a younger woman he met at church; he insists that he gave her money to fix her teeth so she could get a job.
A magician demands that an illusion builder return the money he put down to purchase a $19,000 magic trick.
A woman is convicted of assault after cutting her daughter with a knife during an altercation over puppies; video evidence captures the bloody aftermath.
The Judge warns a grandmother about the risk of having a dangerous dog breed after her Pit Bull attacks a neighbour.

After three murders with chillingly similar scenarios occurred in Austin, Texas, police began to wonder if they were chasing a serial killer, but no evidence was left.
November, 2001 in Fort Worth, Texas, Loyd and Agnes Courtney were beaten and stabbed to death by their own daughter, Deborah Pieringer. Prosecutors say it was for money.
In two months, 20 patients at a Texas hospital are murdered. Nurse Vickie Jackson is sentenced to life with no parole when she pleads 'no contest' to the murders.
A woman disappears on her way to Seattle airport, her fianc√© makes an emotional appeal for her safe return. Two weeks later, her body is found in the trunk of her car.
An Anchorage nurse disappears from her house and only her abandoned car is found. Local police enlist the help of the FBI to solve this baffling case.

The leader of an expedition to a remote asteroid fears for the dissipation of his authority on the group's return to Earth.
Action comedy based on true events, with Tom Cruise. A pilot recruited as a CIA courier in the 1980s uses the opportunity to set up a profitable sideline trafficking drugs for a cartel.
Action thriller with Nicolas Cage. A hunter and collector of rare and exotic animals sees his precious cargo freed onboard a ship by a political assassin being extradited to the Unites States.
